simona.headline: Sail in Elegance with Simona
simona.description: Experience the perfect blend of luxury and performance aboard the Lagoon 400 S2. Designed for comfort and stability, it offers spacious living areas and exceptional views of the Mediterranean.
simona.tagline: A masterpiece of nautical design, perfect for family getaways or sunset cruises.
